basic.description:
A study of changes in Spanish society as reflected in film and/or literature.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: La Sociedad Espanola A Traves Del Cine

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     SPAN261 or SPAN381.
Corequisites    (SPAN301 and SPAN302) or (SPAN303 and SPAN304).
